code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MenuItem=_ref=>{let{title,description,imageName,price}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"menu-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/images/".concat(imageName),alt:title,className:"item-img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"item-title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"item-description",children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"item-footer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"item-price",children:["$",price.toFixed(2)]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary btn-add",children:"Add to Cart"})]})]})]});};export default MenuItem;
